mapper.select: select a.user_id as idUser, a.email as email, a.password as password from user a where a.email = #{email} and a.password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into user( user_id, email, password, nama_lengkap, created_at) values( #{idUser}, #{email}, #{password}, #{namaLengkap}, now())
mapper.select: select a.id_history_login as idHistoryLogin, a.id_user as idUser, a.token as token, a.expired_time as expiredTime from history_login a where a.token = #{token} order by a.created_at desc only fetch first rows
